metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3239 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
Off-by-one error in the dwarf_to_unw_regnum function in include/dwarf_i.hin libunwind 1.1 allows local users to have unspecified impact via invaliddwarf opcodes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3239` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunwind-setjmp0 - 1.1-4.1
libunwind8 - 1.1-4.1
No subscription required

android-libunwind - 7.0.0+r1-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libunwind package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1-4.1').
racket package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
android-platform-external-libunwind package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.0.0+r1-4').
